      • getInt

        public static int getInt(java.lang.String key,
                         int defaultVal)
        Reads the entry with the given key from the config file as integer.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the entry to read.
        defaultVal - The default value that should be returned if the key is not found in the config file.
        Returns:
        The value as integer

      • getInt

        public static int getInt(java.lang.String key)
        Reads the entry with the given key from the config file as integer.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the entry to read.
        Returns:
        The value as integer, or 0 if nothing was found.

      • getBoolean
